attributes.action: To stop the football premier league from playing ANY fixtures abroad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The FA premier league is considering adding an additional fixture to the Premier league season, which would be played abroad,

this is a clear betrayal of the loyal British fan base, taking away our most cherished sporting event, as well as effecting the season itself

the premier league has already priced out the traditional working class support and this is a step too far against their own fans and cannot be allowed to happen.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
